net.realmproject.dcm.features.value

Class AbstractValueDevice<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.realmproject.dcm.event.IDeviceEventNode
      • net.realmproject.dcm.event.relay.AbstractDeviceEventRelay
        • net.realmproject.dcm.event.publisher.IDeviceEventPublisher
          • net.realmproject.dcm.event.Device
            • net.realmproject.dcm.features.value.AbstractValueDevice<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceEventNode, Identity, Logging, DeviceEventPublisher, DeviceEventRelay, ValueDevice<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IValueDevice

    public abstract class AbstractValueDevice<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends Device
implements ValueDevice<T>
    Simple implementation of a device which listens for get/set events, calls Values.setValue on set and publishes Values.getValue on get.
    Author:
    NAS
